activities: PeopleNet may receive personal information from the EU through its clients where PeopleNet provides time tracking services for companies.  The following data types may be processed on behalf of our clients: client's employee name, time records, and tax identification numbers, identification numbers issued by government agencies, photographs, salary and other benefit information.
personaldata: On-line, off-line, manually processed, including client information.
recoursemech: Suspected violations or complaints may be reported to the appropriate department within the organization. Unresolved complaints may be reported to JAMS http://www.jamsadr.com/rules-international-rules/
